summary: All a long time ago took issue with crossbow quiver. A cure was pretty easy. Here\'s my version of \"cure\"
descriptionHtml:
All a long time ago took issue with crossbow quiver.
A cure was pretty easy. 
Here\'s my version of \"treatment\"
The model was slightly elevated, so as not to \"rip up\" tails of beastraces


Comments from author
The reason for the bug: As I understand it, the arrows are attached to the \"plane\" on the back of the player. The developers of this seems to have forgotten, and the model was too small \"stock\" in the deviation from this plane.
What does this fix: In fact, just replace \"vanilla\" model with the \"vanilla\" with far-offset axes.
Incompatibility and requirements: must be installed DLC \"dawnguard\".  Incompatible with any model replacement of bolt quiver.
Distribution: Free, just give credits :3.
author: Sufferot
